snippet: The scale of the accident compounded the difficulty of the response to the Oregon bus crash that killed nine people and injured more than three dozen others, authorities said Monday.
abstract: Scale of Oregon bus crash compounds difficulty of response to accident that killed nine people and injured more than three dozen others; tour bus from Canada, which carried  many passengers who only speak Korean, was returning from Las Vegas when bus crashed through guardrail onto icy slopes.
lead_paragraph: The scale of the accident compounded the difficulty of the response to the Oregon bus crash that killed nine people and injured more than three dozen others, authorities said Monday.

headline.seo: Rescue Effort Hampered in Fatal Oregon Bus Crash
headline.main: Rescue Effort Hampered in Bus Crash That Killed 9
headline.print_headline: Rescue Effort Hampered in Bus Crash That Killed 9
